name: Sailor Cap's Entry!
description: Entry for Camp Straight from Hell S2! The plot is that Sailor Cap was assigned to make a game. Which game will he make In this entry about making an entry? Listen to hints and get the true ending! (But all endings lead back to the title screen). Get ranked at the end to get any range of endings and see how you perform based on the game you make! If there are any bugs, then oh well, but I'm still leaving this project open to updates. IMPORTANT!! If you don’t hear any sounds, and you’re on mobile, switch to PC, sound is highly recommended
